channel.title: [Renamed] Renaming NPC's

item.title: [Renamed] Renaming NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Wenis_Tree Wenis Tree
item.description:
@Wenis_Tree wrote:

in entitydef.jerba under

public static EntityDef forID(int i) {

and under the switch statement…

add

case 742: entityDef.name = "Elvrags New Name"; //Change to what ever entityDef.combatLevel = 243; //if u want to change its combat level break;

you might have to do some renaming.

Read full topic

item.title: [Renamed] Renaming NPC's
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hah well the title looks funny cause rename is in it twice. But in all seriousness. I want to rename a couple NPC’s, but it’s just not working.
I’ve got this in there for one of my NPC’s:

if(i == 2084)
            {
                name = "Zombie Slayer";
            }

and it doesn’t work.
what would I do to rename an NPC.
I want to rename one of the dragons, specifically Elvrag. NPC ID: 742.
But I don’t know how

Read full topic
